item.description:
The weather starts to get cooler in September, and it's the perfect time to enjoy the Salem Willows before the mad tourist rush of October.

We'll meet at 7:00 outside of the casino. Feel free to come earlier to grab a bite to eat or we can all get food and ice cream after some games. If you've never been to the Willows then you're in for a treat, as the arcade and the casino are a blast. I for one am very excited about skeeball and that wonderful horse-racing game we discovered at our last Meetup.

If you can't make it at 7:00, don't worry, we'll see you when you get there. For use on that night should you not be able to locate us, David's number is 812-240-3236.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in front of the Casino

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Friday night at the Willows
